docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., July 16--Replies from fifty-five countries to the May 18 request of the General Assembly for an embargo against Communist China and North Korea were made public today. Thirty-five Governments pledged all-out support of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., July 16--Replies from fifty-five countries to the May 18 request of the General Assembly for an embargo against Communist China and North Korea were made public today. Thirty-five Governments pledged all-out support of the action.
docs.abstract: UN gets replies from 55 nations on Assembly appeal for embargo; list; 35 nations including 5 non-members pledge support; USSR bloc holds Assembly action illegal

headline.main: 35 NATIONS PLEDGE RED ARMS EMBARGO; 5 Non-Members of U.N. Report on Observing Action Urged in Assembly Resolution.
